overview.en: USDC is a fully collateralized US dollar stablecoin. It is an Ethereum powered coin and is the brainchild of CENTRE, an open source project bootstrapped by contributions from Circle and Coinbase.
overview.zh: USDCoin（USDC）是一个完全可抵押的对标美元的稳定币，它提供详细的财务和运营透明度，并在美国货币流通法的框架内运行，而且跟多家银行机构和审计团队合作。
